com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.step

Interface StepColumn

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Column

    public interface StepColumn
    A basic interface for wrapping user-defined and internally defined Columns

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  StepColumn.COLUMN_TYPE
      Column type constant.

        Gets the column name

        Gets the external column name (i.e. the raw name of the database column)
        Returns:
        Column name

      • getValue

        Object getValue(long row)
         throws Exception
        Gets a value for a given row in the column
        Parameters:
        row - The row number
        Returns:
        An object containing the value
        Throws:
        Exception - If any errors occur

      • getBackground

        Color getBackground()
        Gets the background color of the column
        Returns:
        The column's background colour

      • setBackground

        void setBackground(Color backgroundColor)
        Set the background color of the column when displayed in the grid
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - The color required for the column

      • getDataTags

        default List<String> getDataTags()
        Get data tags associated with the column
        Returns:
        a list of data tag names

      • setType

        void setType(StepColumn.COLUMN_TYPE type)
        Set the type of the column. Currently only used to set whether the column is boolean, and can be used by the validation step.
        Parameters:
        type - The type required for the column

      • getType

        StepColumn.COLUMN_TYPE getType()
        Get the type of the column. Currently only returns a BOOLEAN for validation columns, otherwise a string.
        Returns:
        the column type - BOOLEAN or STRING

      • isValidation

        boolean isValidation()
        Get the type of the column. Currently only returns a BOOLEAN for validation columns, otherwise a string.
        Returns:
        the column type - BOOLEAN or STRING
